017package squidpony.squidai.astar;
018
019import java.util.List;
020
021/**
022 * A graph is a collection of nodes, each one having a collection of outgoing {@link Connection connections}.
023 * Because this works with indexed A*, each node must also have a unique index.
024 * 
025 * @param <N> Type of node
026 * 
027 * @author davebaol */
028public interface Graph<N> {
029
030        /** Returns the connections outgoing from the given node.
031         * @param fromNode the node whose outgoing connections will be returned
032         * @return the array of connections outgoing from the given node. */
033        List<Connection<N>> getConnections(N fromNode);
034        
035        /** Returns the unique index of the given node.
036         * @param node the node whose index will be returned
037         * @return the unique index of the given node. */
038        int getIndex(N node);
039
040        /** Returns the number of nodes in this graph. */
041        int getNodeCount();
042
043}
